transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji ye Rustam Rustam Agro Industries se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Sir Ujjwal baat kar raha tha India Mart se sir.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Sir abhi aap Rustam aapka ek issue aaya tha aapne feedback share kiya hai service very bad ka sir.
Customer: Kis cheez ka?
Executive: Sir aapne ek Android feedback share kiya tha sir service very bad ka sir.
Customer: Achcha achcha main achcha service very bad ka.
Customer: Matlab aapki India Mart ki service very bad ka feedback maine share kiya hai.
Executive: Haan sir bataiye sir kya haan ji sir.
Customer: Nahi sir maine aisa kuch nahi kiya.
Executive: To sir aapke aapke aapke paas website pe hua hai kis number se.
Customer: Phone se hua hai sir ya fir aapke papa ne kiya hoga sir kyunki Jamal sahab se hi baat hoti thi fir aapse baat hui thi prati ji se to aap bata dete na ki wo admit hai sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha kya abhi koi plan nahi hai bulane ka unhe.
Customer: Haan nahi fir aapne bataya tha ki aapke papa ki tabiyat bhi nahi sahi chal rahi heart attack heart attack aapne bataya tha.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Sir sir dekhiye feedback share ho raha hai daily service use ho rahi hai aur sir hum log aur sir aapki taraf se na sir har dusre teesre din mein buylead shortage ho rahi hai to aap log attempt kar rahe ho buylead buy karne ka.
Executive: To sir ye service sir aap bataiye sir service aap use kar rahe hain ya aapke papa use kar rahe hain Jamal sahab use kar rahe hain.
Customer: Nahi service to chalo abhi koi bhi use kar raha ho main abhi aapka point ye nahi samajh paya ki aap jaise keh rahe hain ke services use kar rahe hain hum.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Aap kya keh rahe hain feedback kis cheez ka aaya hai main samjha nahi.
Executive: Feedback aaya hai ki service very bad matlab kis related pe aaya hai ye to maine aapko janne ke liye phone kiya hai ki haan sir kis matlab kis vajah se aapko service very bad lagi isi regarding aapko phone kyunki sir dekhiye.
Customer: Theek hai sir main ek baar baat kar leta hu uska main reason shayad ye ho sakta hai ki aap kya kehte hain aapke multiple kya kehte hain team hai har team se alag call aati hai har team ko bolte hain abhi plan nahi hai lene ka fir bhi aap force karte hain call kare jate hain ho sakta hai unhone.
Executive: Sir call call aapse meri last time jab aapko prati aap se baat hui thi sir prati ji ne baat kari thi theek sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Aapne mana kar diya tha uske baad normal ek call haan ek call ki thi normal ki wo kis tarah dikat aapke aa rahi hai haan bas ek ek hafte baad jo aapko bata diya tha ki normal ek hamara bhi.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Sir issue dwara batai to hum sahi kar rahe hain theek sir feedback call thi.
Customer: Main ek baar baat kar leta hu father se jaisa bhi hai aur aapko delete kar dunga koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Aur sir unke matlab jo bhi service use kar rahe hain agar aap nahi use kar rahe hain to aapke father use kar rahe hain sir dekhiye hum log ne last time bhi aapse matlab aap baat kari thi upgrade ke liye to aapne mana kar diya tha ki nahi chahiye lekin sir main dekh raha tha na jab udhar bhi service to sir aap log service use kar rahe hain sir aapko matlab buylead shortage pad jati hai to uski bhi kafi sari aapke taraf se matlab payment attempt karne ki koshish ki gayi hai jaise aapko bataya tha ki jo hum log ko buylead milti hai abhi.
Customer: Achcha wo payment karne ki koshish karte hain uski baat kar rahe ho na aap.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Wo try kiya hoga baba ne.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur sir apne apne sir haan ye sab cheeze aur sir hamari taraf se sir aapko last time bataya jaise business karne ke teen tarike the apne paas ek aata hai buylead ke through jo aap buylead consume karte ho theek sir ek aa jata hai inquiry ke through jo aap.
Customer: Main actually sir main abhi thoda bike chala raha hu main aapse baat karta hu baad mein baki sir main jaisa bhi ek baar jaise bhi discussion pehle papa se kar lu fir aapko bataunga sir jo bhi baat hai main abhi kuch keh nahi sakta apne end se.
Executive: To aap sir main kitni der matlab aapse puchhu kyunki sir mere ko na is is is is feedback ka chahiye tha kyunki sir iska mere ko concern raise hai to usko close karwana tha.
Customer: Theek hai sir main unse kal ko bolta hu sir main ki aap dekho sir main abhi filhal hum kisi bhi prime member side pe to jayenge nahi sir main aapko baat batau ye to clear hai yahan tak ki agar papa ko ek particular lead pay karne ke liye open karne ke liye agar pay karna hoga to wo baat alag hai lekin filhal koi plan lene ka hamara koi plan nahi hai.
Executive: Dekhiye koi baat nahi sir wo sir totally aap pe depend karta hai theek hai hume hume laga ki sir aapko requirement hai to humne aapko suggest kiya tha ki aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi requirement nahi hai sir main aapko ek baat aur confirm kar du agar father usko 10 baar bhi khol rahe hain India Mart ko aur 100 baar lead open bhi kar rahe hain to bhi aap call na kare to better hai kyunki plan nahi hai kuch purchase karne ka abhi.
Executive: Sir uske lekin sir dekhiye to ek apna basic.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive seeks feedback on 'service very bad'.

- Customer denies providing negative feedback.

- Customer states multiple teams call despite refusal.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the feedback process.

- Executive clarified about payment attempts for buyleads.

- Customer agreed to discuss with his father.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with his father and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, buyleads, service, payment, subscription
